whyJSON.heading: Why SAP Fiori?
whyJSON.description: SAP Fiori 2.0 enhances the user experience for SAP S/4HANA, offering a unified, responsive, and role-based interface across both on-premise and cloud solutions. It streamlines business processes and increases productivity through its intuitive design, making it easier for users to perform tasks on any device.

bulletPoints.title: Unified User Experience
bulletPoints.description: Provides a consistent design for both cloud and on-premise SAP applications.

bulletPoints.title: Role-based Access
bulletPoints.description: Centralized access through SAP Fiori Launchpad, tailored to specific user roles.

bulletPoints.title: Seamless Device Integration
bulletPoints.description: Start a task on one device (desktop, smartphone, tablet) and continue on another without interruption.

bulletPoints.title: Wide Application Range
bulletPoints.description: Over 300+ role-based apps are available across various business functions like HR, Manufacturing, and Finance.

bulletPoints.title: Built with UI5
bulletPoints.description: SAP Fiori apps use the modern UI5 framework, ensuring a responsive and engaging interface.

bulletPoints.title: Increased User Productivity
bulletPoints.description: Streamlined processes and easy-to-use functionality enable users to accomplish tasks more efficiently, boosting overall productivity.
